channel.title: Looking to get started
channel.description: Could anyway give me tips on the best way to get started on putting my own private server up? I've done a little bit of coding and got a server up once, but that was the only time ever and I don't know how anymore So If someone could tell me the best way to get started or point me in the right direction I would be very thankful With love, Marisa

item.description:
@pray4urlife wrote:

I would say start with some kind of 317, and just search for tutorials, then next thing you will know is your server will be online. Good luck!
